mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (ONO, MNO, PNO, OAMOUNT, ODATE, OADDR, OPHONE, OPAYMENT, ONOTE, OPRICE, OSIZE) VALUES (ORDERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mNo}, #{pNo}, #{oAmount}, SYSDATE, #{oAddr}, #{oPhone}, 1, #{oNote}, #{oPrice}, #{oSize})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(O.OPRICE), 0) FROM ORDERS O WHERE O.MNO = ( SELECT M.MNO FROM MEMBERS M WHERE M.MID = #{mId} )
